article: A man wants to go  _  one side of a river to  the other  . There is only one boat. He  has to  take a  _  , a wolf and a basket of vegetbles with him. But he can only take one of them at a time because the boat is vey  _  . "If I  leave  the wolf and the sheep together, the wolf may eat the sheep." he says to himself . "If I leave the sheep and the  _  together, the sheep may eat them ." He thinks and thinks. At last, he has a(n)  _  . And he can get to the other side of the river  _  the sheep, the wolf and the vegetables. Do you know  _  he does it?
